definitions.body: (apart from Ez) East, esp. ´[[קּ]]:([[הַ]])[[רוּחַ ]] wind of the East, east wind, oft. as violent and scorching, from desert on SE., = Ar. sirocco (4rqyh; eastern), cf. Dr:Am 4:9 : Ex 10:13, Ex 10:13 (JE), Ex 14:21 (J), Je 18:17 (sim.), Jon 4:8, Ps 48:8; also ´[[ק]]: ([[רוּחַ]] om.) = east wind Ge 41:6, Ge 41:23, Ge 41:27 (E), Ho 12:2, Ho 13:15, Is 27:8, Job 15:2, Job 27:21, Job 38:24, Ps 78:26.—[[קָדִימָה]] Hb Hab 1:9 is dub., usu. eastward, i.e. forward, but text prob. corrupt, cf. We Now Da, GASm prop. [[מַקְדִּים]] (v. also [[[מְגַמָּה]]] p. 169 supr.).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: as adv. [[קָדִ֫ימָה]] eastward Eze 11:1, Eze 44:1, Eze 47:1; + W Eze 45:7 (del. Berthol Krae), Eze 48:18, + N, S, W, v:Eze 48:10, v:Eze 48:17; also [[קָּדִים]]([[הַ]]) eastward Eze 40:19, Eze 43:17, Eze 46:1, Eze 46:12, Eze 47:1, Eze 47:3, + N v:Eze 47:2.
